channel.title: 667 - Trading
channel.description:
Trading doesn't work, There is a "trade" file but when you right click on another player to trade nothing happens. I really need help with this. My skype is mattpope-fiji Will offer staff on my server to anyone who can help.
No i'm not a leecher.. So please don't flame. Don't say to start on a 317 cause i have, I'm trying 667s so any help is appreciated.
